mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (id, pwd, name, email, tel, zipcode, addr1, addr2, regdate) VALUES (#{id}, md5(#{pwd}), #{name}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{zipcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT * FROM user WHERE id=#{id} AND pwd=md5(#{pwd})
SELECT * FROM user WHERE name=#{name} AND email=#{email}
SELECT * FROM user WHERE id=#{id} AND email=#{email}
